name: Stratagem: Space Arena
description:
Created as a joint final project for a Bachelor of Interactive Entertainment at SAE Institute, Stratagem is a hotseat, tactical space strategy game. As the player, choose your race, create and build your fleet, then methodically manoeuvre and defeat your enemy.

Released December 2014.

Credits:

Project Lead: Jess Larcombe

Lead Programmer: Brian Duhs

Lead Design: Caleb Barton
